benefits.title: Flexibility Across Chains
benefits.subtitle: Our dApp enables DAOs to break free from chain-specific limitations, streamlining salary management across various blockchain networks. No matter the chain, our solution has you covered.

benefits.title: Automated Efficiency
benefits.subtitle: Say goodbye to manual salary distributions. Our automated system ensures timely and consistent payouts, freeing up your DAO's resources for more impactful endeavors.

benefits.title: Earn While You Pay
benefits.subtitle: Instead of funds lying idle, our integration with Aave V3 transforms your treasury into a dynamic revenue generator. Your DAO earns rewards from decentralized finance activities, reinforcing financial stability and growth.
